review: I would love to give this a 5, unfortunately given the staggering problems with the wifi giving it a 4 is being generous. It's a fantastic device but almost unusable with out steady wifi.
author: Sean

review: This is great.....makes it easy to watch Netflix on our older TV that is not a Smart TV.  Very reasonable price and simple hookup.
author: Hope M LaRocque

review: I did not see any where that I had to paid for every movie and TV show. Your advertisements make it sound that the fire stick was all you needed. Greatly disappointed. I have a Smart Flat Screen with Netflix and Hulu included for $17 a month. Your movies would cost a more a month. Fire Stick is no bargain, if it sound to good to be true then it's probably not. NOT
author: William A. Tyler

review: Love it just wish you could surf the web on it as well.
